page.title: 15DESFORD BAND
page.content: People like bands because they give an opportunity to meet different people of their own age and interests.They also give exciting entertainment.The Desford band started at the turn of the century but only changed its name to the Desford Colliery Welfare Band in 1956.At this time most of the members were miners. The band also has tuition for younger people and a junior band.That means nearly 100 people are involved in making music.This thriving and successful band has won the Granada Band competition for the past four years.
